name: reactboot
description: Reactboot: react actuator site for spring boot

scripts.start: npm run copy && PORT=3001 REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version react-scripts start
scripts.start:demo: npm run copy:demo && PORT=3001 REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version REACT_APP_DEMO=demo react-scripts start
scripts.build: npm run copy && REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version react-scripts build
scripts.build:demo: npm run copy:demo && REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version REACT_APP_DEMO=demo react-scripts build
scripts.copy: rimraf ./src/package-copied.json && rimraf ./public/i18n && rimraf ./public/actuator && ncp package.json src/package-copied.json && ncp '../i18n' './public/i18n'

author: FranÃ§ois Onimus
